resources.string: The username must be between 4 and 32 characters long
You\'re currently not logged in. Without logging in you won\'t be able to create posts or vote on existing posts.
Please use this app responsibly and stay aware of your surroundings at all times. We are not responsible for any kind of accident arising from the use of this app.

You can format your post as follows:
 [SPOILER] is replaced with a button that hides all following text
 [IMG http://…] is replaced with a picture from the specified URL
 [TITLE:Your title here] is removed in your post and displays "Your title here" in the overview

We do not guarantee that your credentials will remain secret after you enter them here.\n While we do encrypt your credentials and never display them or transmit them over an unencrypted connection, we cannot be held accountable if your credentials are leaked in any way.

This app was created in 12 weeks as a preparation for our matriculation projects by: Simon Baumgartner, Albin Bommer & Marc Himmelberger\n It is also available on GitHub at https://github.com/S7uXN37/TrafficTimeWaste
